entities.name: nicholas flamel
entities.description: Nicholas Flamel is not mentioned in this text. However, it seems like Nicholas Flamel is a person of interest because the year 159 is associated with him.

entities.name: weasleys
entities.description: The Weasleys are a family of wizards who are playing Quidditch. They are known for their mischievous behavior and are worried about Snape refereeing the match.

relationships.description: Snape is refereeing the Quidditch match between Gryffindor and Slytherin.
The Weasleys are competing against Slytherin in the Quidditch match.
